\listfiles
\documentclass{article}

\usepackage{normalcolor}
\setnormalcolor{green}
\usepackage{xcolor}

\usepackage{blindtext}
\begin{document}
\color{blue}
\tableofcontents
\blinddocument
\setnormalcolor{red}
\blinddocument

\resetnormalcolor
\blinddocument
\end{document}
\endinput
